subject: Attention, Beneficiary
body:
Attention, Beneficiary
I am Mrs. Tina More from Ministry Of Finance Cotonou Head office this
is to bring to you notice that after the conference meeting we had,
The Government of this country realized that you are among those that
involved in scam victim we have in our list to Compensate by the
government of this country as instructions from United Nation UN The
Governor of this state Cotonou Benin Republic has instructed this
office to forward your file to western union transfer department to
pay you the sum of US$1.200,000.00 through western union.
His Excellence the Government has instructed the western union
department Patrick Onu to send the sum of US$1.200,000.00 through his
custody for easy receiver of your funds. You are to contact them now
to ensure that your fund will be transferring to you once you send
them the needed information to avoid wrong transaction.According to
the demands of WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER you are to receive your
fund at the installment rate of $5,000.00 daily until the
US$1.200,000.00 is completely transferred to you accordingly. You are
to contact them now with the bellow information to avoid wrong
transaction.
Reconfirm your address
(1)Your Full name:...............
(2)Your Phone number:..............
(3)Your Contact address:..........
(4)Your Date of Birth....................
Listen very carefully, tell Patrick Onu that you advise to contact him
by Mrs. Tina More. from Ministry Of Finance here in Cotonou Benin
;Below is their Contact Information.
Contact with this information below:
CONTACT PERSON:PATRICK ONU
EMAIL: address : (
mfinance091@gmail.com
)
Address: 12 Avenue Island streets, Cotonou, Benin Republic
Please, do not forget to update me as soon as you receive your first payment.
Best regards.
Mrs.Tina More
Ministry of Finance
Benin Republic

subject: Re:   Attention, Beneficiary
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the compensation from the government. It's good to know that steps are being taken to address the issue of scam victims.

I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding. Could you please provide more details about how this compensation process works? How exactly does Western Union come into play? And what is the reason behind needing my personal information again?

I want to make sure that everything is in order and that I understand the process correctly. Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Sandra

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary
body:
Hello! How can I help you today?

Best wishes,
Sandra

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary
body:
Hello
Your not helping me, read the first message very carefully and do the
needful by sending your information as stated.

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary
body:
Hello! I apologize if I misunderstood your first message. Could you please clarify what information or assistance you are looking for? I'll do my best to help you out.

Best wishes,
Sandra

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary
body:
Hello Mrs. Tina More from the Ministry of Finance in Cotonou. Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in compensating scam victims like myself. 

I would like to know more about the process of receiving the funds through Western Union. Could you please provide me with some additional details? How long does it usually take for the funds to be transferred? Is there any specific documentation or identification required on my end? 

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "reconfirming my address"? Is it necessary for me to provide my address again, or do you already have that information on file?

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Sandra

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary
body:
You must reconfirm your information, so that the process will take place
immediately.

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the process you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional details?

Best wishes,
Sandra

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary
body:
Send the below information

Reconfirm your address

(1)Your Full name:...............
(2)Your Phone number:..............
(3)Your Contact address:..........
(4)Your Date of Birth..................

I am looking forward to receive the above information.

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your interest in receiving the information. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding.

Could you please provide more details about the information you are referring to? What is it about and how will it be shared with me? Additionally, may I know the purpose of reconfirming my address, full name, phone number, contact address, and date of birth?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Sandra

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary
body:
The reason is to make sure we don't make mistake by releasing your fund to
another person, is a security reason. Pls understand and follow the
instructions.

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I completely understand the need for security measures when it comes to releasing funds. Can you please provide me with more details about the process? I want to make sure everything is done correctly and efficiently.

Best wishes,
Sandra

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary
body:

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided. Can you please tell me more about the compensation program? How did the government determine that I am eligible for this compensation?

Best wishes,
Sandra

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary
body:
There is document will backup your fund when it reach to release the money
into your bank account. But mode of the payment will be installment payment.

So before we take any step you must send your information.and bear it mind
that there processing fee you are going to pay before we release your fund .

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you provided about a document that will back up my funds when they are released into my bank account. Could you please tell me more about this document and how it works? I'm curious to learn more about the payment process and the processing fee you mentioned.

Best wishes,
Sandra

subject: Re: Attention, Beneficiary
body:
After paying the processing fee which is Â£450 we will officially procure
proof of fund I mean ownership certificate which it will signify you are
the real owner of the fund. Because if you read our previous message very
well, you will find out that you are involved in scam victim list, that is
why government mapped a huge amount of money to compensate all the scam
victim in the list. Besides there is many people that fall into the victim,
that is why is very very important for you reconfirm your information and
your account details.because the payment will go bank to bank.

I hope am making myself clear?
